name: Into the Plaguelands
description:
Into The Plaguelands Demo

Jump into Hyrania, a once beautiful World now infested with a life consuming plague.  Embark on a journey as the last brave adventurer and save the world . Into the Plaguelands is an action RPG, where you explore a dying world, solve its mysteries and craft your own combat style to slay powerful foes.

Features 

Into the Plaguelands has awesome features to grant the best RPG experience:

  • Classless ...Why limit yourself to a simple class when you can master it all!
  • Unlock new abilities, We promise these are fun!
  • Exciting combat, Surprise your enemies by swapping weapons and access your different skillsets
  • Exploration,  What could be out there?
  • Item drops and Equipment ,To grow even stronger !
  • Dungeons to conquer, Slay those wretched Plaguebearers!
  • And more to come! Remember this is only a demo

Important note: If stuck check our Devlog

Socials

Follow Runeheim Studios and Into the Plaguelands here and become part of our community.

Note: We would love to receive any feedback you may have, though we would appreciate if you send it in our discord in the feedback channel! This way we have the best chance to see it.
